text: John Voorhis "Tim" Bogert III (August 27, 1944 - January 13, 2021) was an American blues rock singer-songwriter and bassist. He was born in New York City. Bogert played with Carmine Appice and appeared with Vanilla Fudge, Cactus and the power trio Beck, Bogert & Appice. Bogert died on January 13, 2021 at the age of 76.Tim Bogert (Beck, Bogert & Appice, Vanilla Fudge, Cactus) has died ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American rock singers Category:American rock musicians Category:American blues singers Category:American blues musicians Category:American bass guitarists Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Singer-songwriters from New York City
title: Tim Bogert
